song.title: I Don't Wish You Happy New Year
song.info:
PC + Atari ST MIDI sync. Vocals are Amiga + Atari.
"I Don't Wish You Happy New Year Coz anyway this year is shit Ben Laden's still running : your Game Boy is not safe ! People are going crazy Mickael Jackson is dead Do you really think this life is worth living ? Yes, there's an other world, a little secret garden Called the Retro Land, where everything's so colorfull Biatch, we are pixelised but we don't give a flyin' fuck We are the Outrun gangstas, ghostriding our red car Rumble pack, wireless pads, analog sticks, what's dat shit ? We just need A, B, Select, Start, left and right Too much pixels's bad, that's what your Mama says Kid you know she's always right, now go and kill your X-Box Me and my crew are addicted to the Chip Sound YM and SID, those ones are good for you ! Rumble pack, wireless pads, analog sticks, what's dat shit ? We just need A, B, Select, Start, left and right ..."
